item.title: Events
item.author: info@ldaca.edu.au (Language Data Commons of Australia)
item.description: Forthcoming Workshops Previous Workshops Webinars Advice for researchers Forthcoming Workshops Language Data Commons of Australia – Co-Design Workshops The Australian Research Data Commons (ARDC) invites the research community to join 2 workshops to co-design a national research infrastructure program that will support the Language Data Commons of Australia. We will be holding 2 open co-design workshops to better understand the current challenges around establishing the Language Data Commons of Australia.
